statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 0 \\ 6 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 4 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 13 \\ 36 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
